discourse_list.title: [Learn] How to provide liquidity and earn UNI

content.content: The initial liquidity mining program went live last night. Users can now earn UNI tokens by being a liquidity provider for one of the following four pools and then submitting these liquidity tokens on this page:  ETH/USDT ETH/USDC ETH/DAI ETH/WBTC  5,000,000 UNI will be allocated per pool to LPs proportional to liquidity, which roughly translates to:  83,333.33 UNI per pool per day 13.5 UNI UNI per pool per block  That being said, we cannot estimate for you how much your rewards will be, you can do so yourself on the UNI pool page.  The following steps need to be made:  Provide liquidity on one of the above pools Head over to this page and ‘deposit’ your liquidity tokens in the pool you participated in. That’s it, you’ll see your reward estimate and the time the initial reward pool will still be open for. Note: without depositing the liquidity tokens on this page you will not receive UNI, just providing liquidity to one of the pools isn’t enough.  Screenshot 2020-09-18 at 09.20.311598×1395 502 KB
Hi, I am new to this, please let me know how to do it and what to do it in this. Thank you
Hi Tanwarn, Please read the post, as there’s steps to follow.
@TMod_Marco pls stand by as I will chat you up to put me through incase I encounter issues pulling this off
Thanks, this was very helpfull
Nice. Already add eth/usdt to mine, but i didn’t see how much I deposit ? Only profit. I mean on the “Pool” there is how much x/y you deposit but on “Uni” i didn’t see it ?
Hi Ilvito, I’m not exactly sure what you mean with this. However, if you need support, then you’d be best of joining the Discord channel  https://discord.gg/WXbXXd
Very informative post. Thanks for the instructions. Once I added liquidity I was given the LP tokens. I have deposited these in the pool so hopefully I start to get some UNI

@TMod_Marco Hi Marco Can you please provide a guide on how to remove liquidity from eth-dai pool. I already exited the pool and the LP tokens shows in my balance but how do I extract the eth and dai from the LP tokens ? Thanks
I don’t know where to post this. I just saw this website and could guess it’s not legit.    unidrop.org    Uniswap Crypto Project       Could we try to stop this?

Go to https://uniswap.info/accounts. Enter your public address while connected to your wallet, scroll down to your provided liquidity pools (positions) and select ‘remove’. @pfleck That’s a fake account indeed. At the end of the day, we do what we can to remove it from the forum, but other than that people need to DYOR.
this site is scam.warning warning scam sacam scam
Hi Marco, I have had a problem for weeks now I can’t remove my liquidity pool.  I then approve when I click confirm nothing is happening.  I don’t know what to do, can you help me?

Hi Nessma, That’s interesting, a smart contract / tx should pop up. It’s probably best for you to join the support Discord channel and ask your question there as this is the governance forum: https://discord.gg/uhPsC4

hi, i have provided liquidity into the same pool twice, on two different time frames. Is there a way i can partially remove liquidity now? Or is the only way to fully remove it and then re-add it partially back?
Please use the support Discord channel: https://discord.gg/EWE9ACU. It gives you the option to select how much liquidity you want to remove on the dedicated page.

what are you talking about? Just don’t fomo in shady tokens. That’s fairly easy
not when I try to retrieve liquidity it all goes to this one address my tokens and the liquidty tokens. I had eth and wbtc no fake shit … Sent on my Boost Mobile Samsung Galaxy S9.

@BDizz @birdwoman This is a governance forum, not the support Discord channel. BDizz, when providing liquidity you are subject to price volatility. You can read about these risks online. There’s a lot of guides and content about this. I’d recommend you learn about this before trying to provide liquidity.

yeah I’m not complaining I know RISK but needs to quit happening or won’t be a uniswap regular people will give up and not support this dapp I know i had real coin came from coinbase acct they put some program in i see it in code not dummy just don’t know how to switch it n they collect all my real coin ive seen lots of people complain of same problems and u must burn tokens for your liquidity but doesn’t allow the time if been paying with app last 4 months its get worse and worse with programmers and miners so good luck didn’t help with anything i have all my etherscan info its all the bullshit contracts and miners owning everything using fake tokens taking everything… Brendon Schuler

I’m not sure what you mean. But, again, Uniswap doesn’t censor any listings and it’s up to you to do your research and decide which projects are legitimate and which are not. As for liquidity providing, again this comes with risk and I recommend you to do research to this as well. I don’t know what you mean with real vs fake coins, it simply depends on which smart contract you interact with. Be aware of potential scams. If you need any further support on that matter, then please join Uniswap on Discord. This is simply not the place. Thank you
